name: Clinical Psychology 2022
content: We are pleased and honored to invite you to the “World Congress on Clinical Psychiatry" which is going to be held during December 01-02, 2022 | London, UK | Hybrid. This conference is organized around the theme “ Remedial approaches towards Psychiatry and Mental illness" which covers a wide range of critically important sessions and activities like research, education, consultation, forensic demonstration, program development and management. For more details please have glance at: https://psychology.euroscicon.com/
